title: Software architect
description: Working as Software engineer at Digital:Lab Volkswagen in a multidisciplinary team where the most important things are the product quality, the team and having fun!! Using TDD and pair programming to achieve the code quality. Doing team or office events to make people feel more close and build a good community.

projects.title: Hexad GmbH
projects.description: I'm currently working on a real time platform for tracking vehicles. We are building the full solution, from setting up a linux FPGA device for transmitting the telemetry information to processing, analyzing and displaying the information.
